Important: The information in this document is obsolete and should not be used for new development.

Inside Macintosh: Advanced Color Imaging on the Mac OS

Advanced Color Imaging on the Mac OS

Advanced Color Imaging on the Mac OS provides conceptual information and code samples, with step-by-step instructions for extending your application\xBCs color capabilities.

Book Contents
Figures, Tables, and Listings
Preface - About This Book
Chapter 1 - Palette Manager
Chapter 2 - Color Picker Manager
Chapter 3 - Introduction to the ColorSync Manager
Chapter 4 - Developing ColorSync-Supportive Applications
Chapter 5 - Developing Color Management Modules
Chapter 6 - Developing ColorSync-Supportive Device Drivers
Chapter 7 - Color Manager
Appendix A - ColorSync Manager Backward Compatibility
Glossary

Related Information

The companion to Advanced Color Imaging on the Mac OS is called Advanced Color Imaging Reference. Advanced Color Imaging Reference is available online as well as in Acrobat and QuickView formats.
